nodes.text: Major Joseph was an individual who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

In 0 ABY, Major Joseph was among a group of Imperials that escorted General Sebastian Parnell to the Deathblock, a prison block located on the planet Tol Ado. On arrival at the Deathblock, the Imperials noticed that some of the facility's guards had been killed, so Parnell ordered Joseph to find out who was responsible for their deaths.
Joseph was created by Troy Denning and appeared in one of the role-playing strands of the 1990 West End Games role-playing supplement Jedi's Honor.
